column6: "SPIDER SENSE" PART 2 (OF 2) It's a sad day to be the Human Torch, when your popularity has sunk so low even the web-slinger is more beloved by the people of New York City! Plus: Who is the woman from Reed Richards' past?
column8: | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller:Paul Smith | writer:Mark Waid | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo
